mapper.select: select doc_seq, doc_type, title, writer, site_type, doc_reg_dt, reg_dt from si_crawling ci where site_type = #{siteType} and success_yn = 'Y' order by reg_dt LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO si_crawling ( site_type, doc_seq, doc_type, title, writer, doc_reg_dt, file_yn, contents, detail_url, site_url, success_yn, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{siteType}, #{docSeq}, #{docType}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{docRegDt}, #{fileYn}, #{contents}, #{detailUrl}, #{siteUrl}, #{successYn}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );
